nickname.title: Choose your dropkitchen™ username.
nickname.help-warning: Must be at least 3 letters and contain only letters and numbers.
nickname.help-already: This username is already in use.

message.success: Your verification code has been sent.
message.fail: Verification failed. Please check whether the code entered is correct.
message.over: Oops, you've timed out. Please request a new verification code.

connection.title: Sync Existing Points
connection.desc: All your points will carry over one-to-one.

accumulated.title: Points Accumulated
accumulated.subText1: You can collect points by acquiring new art drops, participating in events, and more.
accumulated.subText2: The amount of points varies by item.

period.title: Use/Expiration Period
period.subText1: Points expire after one year from the date it was earned, unless otherwise notified.

expiration.title: Expiration
expiration.subText1: Points will expire if your account is deleted or deactivated due to inactivity.

modal.title: All updated!
modal.desc: You can check your points in “Points Log”

profile.title: Edit Profile
profile.descPlaceHolder: Tell us a little about yourself.

deviceOn.title: Push notifications are off.
deviceOn.desc: Turn on notifications to get updates on new artwork.

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.desc1: Wait! Check this before you go.
delete.desc4: You'll only be able to rejoin using your email account details after 30 days.
delete.desc5: If you leave and rejoin, your existing data cannot be restored.
delete.desc8: Once you leave, you can't rejoin for at least 30 days using the same email address.

address.title: Address
address.desc: 317, Dosan-daero, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea

random.title: Lucky Box
random.desc:
Drumroll...
Let's see what's inside your Lucky Box!

drop.title: Ta-da!
drop.desc:
You got the digital art!
Want to view it in My Gallery?

random.message1: You already have all available drops.

box.title: Art Drop Box
box.desc:
Tap on ongoing art drops
and collect digital art.

modal.title: Stay up to date on all things art.
modal.context: You'll be notified about the latest art drops, events, and more.

main.alarmAgree: You've agreed to receive notifications on MONTH, DAY, YEAR.

modal.title: Congrats! You acquired a new artwork!
modal.context:
You received 1,000 points.
Ready to check out the artwork in My Gallery?

modal.title: Invite a friend and you both get a gift. It's a win-win!
modal.context: Your friend receives free digital art, and you will receive extra points after they sign up!
modal.subContext: 2,000P for the first 20 friends, 200P for 21 friends and up

dropList.title: Art Drop List

invite.title: Invite a friend and you both get a gift. It's a win-win!
invite.desc: Your friend receives free digital art, and you receive extra points when they sign up.

dropList.empty: The art drops are coming soon!

chat.info2: If the operating policy is violated, there may be restrictions on using the chat room.
chat.info3: Please create a chat room that respects and considers others.
chat.info8: Are you sure you want to go to that profile's gallery?
